summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Anton Furst  was a production designer who won an Academy Award for designing the noirish nightmare version of Gotham City in Tim Burton's Batman . Furst was unable to return to its sequel, Batman Returns, he was replaced by Bo Welch.
^ Anton Furst, 47, Dies; Designer of 'Batman', The New York Times, November 26, 1991
^ "The 62nd Academy Awards  Nominees and Winners". oscars.org. Archived from the original on 6 July 2011. Retrieved 2011-07-31.
title: Anton Furst
